hero.title: Transform your voice notes
hero.description: No more listening to long voice notes. Our AI instantly transcribes your WhatsApp messages with exceptional accuracy.
hero.benefits: ✓ 10 free transcriptions • ✓ No credit card required
hero.demoText: Hi! I wanted to tell you that tomorrow's meeting is postponed to 3pm. Don't forget to bring the documents...

features.title: Why choose VoiceNote Pro?
features.subtitle: Powerful features to simplify your daily life

instant.title: Instant transcription
instant.description: Receive your transcriptions in seconds, directly in WhatsApp.

multilingual.title: Multilingual support
multilingual.description: Accurate transcription in French, English, Spanish and over 50 languages.

security.title: Maximum security
security.description: Your data is encrypted and deleted after processing. Privacy guaranteed.

simple.title: Simple to use
simple.description: Simply send your voice notes to our WhatsApp bot. That's it!

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Track your usage and access your transcription history.

timeSaving.title: Time saving
timeSaving.description: No need to listen to 10-minute messages. Read in 30 seconds.

pricing.title: Simple and transparent pricing
pricing.subtitle: Start for free, scale as you grow

testimonials.title: They trust us
testimonials.subtitle: Discover what our users say about us

testimonial1.name: Marie Laurent
testimonial1.text: Incredible time saver! I can finally manage my colleagues' voice notes without spending hours on them.

testimonial2.name: Thomas Dubois
testimonial2.text: The transcription is remarkably accurate. The perfect tool to never miss anything important.

testimonial3.name: Sophie Martin
testimonial3.text: Simple, efficient and secure. I recommend it to anyone who receives a lot of voice notes.

dataCollection.title: 1. Data Collection
dataCollection.transcription: Transcription data: Voice messages and their transcriptions
dataCollection.usage: Usage data: Connection logs, usage statistics
dataCollection.payment: Payment data: Processed by Stripe (we do not store your banking information)

dataUsage.title: 2. Data Usage
items: Communicate with you regarding your account

storage.title: 3. Storage and Security
storage.content: Your data is stored securely with encryption. Voice messages are deleted after transcription. Transcriptions are kept for your history but can be deleted at any time from your dashboard.

sharing.title: 4. Data Sharing
sharing.intro: We never sell your personal data. We share your data only with:

rights.title: 5. Your Rights
items: Delete your account and all your data

cookies.title: 6. Cookies
cookies.content: We use essential cookies for service operation (authentication). These cookies are necessary and cannot be disabled.

minors.title: 7. Protection of Minors
minors.content: Our service is not intended for persons under 16 years of age. We do not knowingly collect data from minors.

changes.title: 8. Changes
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy. You will be notified of any significant changes by email.

contact.title: 9. Contact
contact.intro: For any questions regarding your personal data:

legal.title: 10. Legal Basis
legal.intro: The processing of your data is based on:

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using VoxKill, you accept these terms of service. If you do not accept these terms, please do not use our service.

service.title: 2. Service Description
service.content: VoxKill is an automatic transcription service for WhatsApp voice messages using artificial intelligence. The service converts your audio messages into text.

acceptable.title: 3. Acceptable Use
items: Use the service legally and ethically
Not transcribe illegal or copyrighted content without authorization
Not use the service for fraudulent activities

account.title: 4. User Account
account.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password. You agree to be responsible for all activities that occur under your account.

intellectual.title: 5. Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: The content you transcribe remains your property. VoxKill does not acquire any rights to your content. You grant us only a limited license to process your audio files for transcription purposes.

liability.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: VoxKill is provided "as is". We do not guarantee perfect accuracy of transcriptions. The service may contain errors and we are not responsible for damages resulting from use of the service.

pricing.title: 7. Pricing and Payment
pricing.content: Prices are listed on our site. Subscriptions renew automatically unless cancelled. You can cancel at any time from your dashboard.

privacy.title: 8. Privacy
privacy.intro: Your use of the service is also governed by our

changes.title: 9. Changes
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes take effect upon publication.

contact.title: 10. Contact
contact.intro: For any questions regarding these terms, contact us at:
